faucet.description: Request funds from the faucet for the supplied address.

address.description: The address to fill from the faucet either in bech32 format, or start with ! to read environment variable.

faucet.description: The url for the faucet endpoint, or an environment variable name containing the url.

messages.noFundsAdded: No funds were added to the address.

transfer.summary: Transfer funds from one address to another.
transfer.description: Transfer funds from one address to another.

address.description: The address to send the funds from either in bech32 format, or start with ! to read environment variable.

dest-address.description: The address to send the funds to either in bech32 format, or start with ! to read environment variable.

amount.description: The amount of funds to send.

seed.description: The seed for the source address in hex or base64 used to sign the transfer, or start with ! to read environment variable.

node.description: The url for the node endpoint, or an environment variable name containing the url.

explorer.description: The url for the explorer endpoint, or an environment variable name containing the url.
